title: In the Case of the Dead Dog, Police Say They ‘May Have Dropped the Ball’
description: Three months after a highly publicized attack in a Brooklyn park left a dog dead, no arrests have been made as the local precinct finds itself in turmoil.
dc:creator: John Leland
media:credit: Andrew Seng for The New York Times
media:description: Jessica Chrustic, whose dog died shortly after being attacked in Prospect Park three months ago.
